title: When will i get an pbe account?
body: My friend told me to wait for an pbe account and i did i did wait 3 hours and nothging happen he get it for like a hour when will i get it?

replies.body: Applying to the PBE doesn't guarantee acceptable or immediately get you in.  As long as your account is in good standing you will remain eligible, but getting in depends on other factors like what's being tested at that time.  More information can also be found at our [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq).  Hopefully that helps clear some things up, and I wish you the best of luck in getting accepted!

They only invite small groups of people about every 2 weeks for each new PBE cycle. They do not accept everyone, and it's random, so you might get it at the next cycle or you might not get it for years or ever.
